definition: to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: Once your head hits the pillow you will probably sleep very fast.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你的腦袋黏上枕頭，你將會很快入睡。

sentences.english: Plumb couldn't sleep that night, thinking about that man.
sentences.chinese: 那一晚帕朗柏無法入睡，心中一直想着那位先生。

sentences.english: With the radio on, grandma slept deeply in the chair .
sentences.chinese: 無線電收音機開者，祖母在椅子裏沉沉的入睡。

sentences.english: All night long night oil lamp, I traveled difficult to sleep .
sentences.chinese: 油盡燈滅如斯長夜，我輾轉難入睡。

sentences.english: Tom's breathing soothed me to sleep like a lull aby.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆的呼吸聲就像催眠曲一樣安撫我入睡。

sentences.english: So close, that when you close your eyes, I fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 如此靠近，當你閉上你的雙眼，我沉沉入睡。

sentences.english: I could hardly fall asleep after finishing the science book.
sentences.chinese: 讀完那本科學書，我無法入睡。

sentences.english: Sleep before the third noon sounds．
Ladies, try sleeping with coconut oil on your face at night.
sentences.chinese: 女孩子們可在臉上塗抹椰子油入睡。

sentences.english: The rain rattled on the roof all night, which kept me awake.
sentences.chinese: 整夜雨打屋頂嗒嗒作響，弄得我無法入睡。

sentences.english: You sigh, toss and turn, and try to get to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 你長吁短嘆，翻來覆去，試圖能夠入睡。

sentences.english: All I need to do is lie down,and I can pop right off.
sentences.chinese: 我惟一的需要就是躺下來，我馬上可以入睡。

sentences.english: I was very tired, and soon I fell into a very deep sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我疲累不堪，很快就沉沉入睡了。

sentences.english: Loud snores from the other room kept her awake.
sentences.chinese: 那邊房間有人打鼾聲音很大她無法入睡。

sentences.english: But they were too terrified to fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他們驚怕得都入睡不了。

sentences.english: Being unable to sleep in bed, I got up and opened the window.
sentences.chinese: 我難以入睡，便爬起來開了窗。

definition: sleep/to sleep/(computing) to enter sleep mode
to go to sleep/to go to bed (literary)
to go to bed/(coll.) to have sex
to get out of bed/to get up
the whole night/all through the night
